title: Can't Connect to chat
body: I have looked and looked for this problem but i can't find anything to help with this problem. I can connect to the game just fine but I cannot to the chat service which means i can;t find any of the friends and they don't see im online. I have re-downloaded the game and it did not fix the issue.

replies.body: We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]

Same thing is happening to me. Its not my internet because i have tried logging in from two different league of legends apps on my phone on separate connections and its still not wanting to reconnect.
